name: Golem: Dice Killer
description:
You have to reach the objective, but everytime you kill an enemy, you roll a dice, if you get 1 you get killed if you survives the roll the dice gets smaller.  At the same time if an enemy kills you, you roll a dice and if you get 1 the enemy, the enemy is killed instead of you.

Controls:   

  • -WASD to move
  •  -Space to attack   
  •  -Mouse Left Click to shoot
